metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1184 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in fs/ext4/namei.c:dx_insert_block() in the Linux kernelâ€™s filesystem sub-component. This flaw allows a local attacker with a user privilege to cause a denial of service.
